alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 3:03AM HST until December 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF BIG ISLAND AND MAUI COUNTY INCLUDING HALEAKALA SUMMIT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS FROM 6 PM HST TONIGHT TO 6 PM HST FRIDAY... .Strong trade winds will be especially strong through Friday, especially where the terrain accelerates the flow. Strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
